revision.text: {{doomwiki}}{{wad |author = Alando1 (Alan) |iwad = Doom2 |port = GZDoom |type = m |status = Released |caco = 17 |ru = 1 |category = "also recommended" |link = {{idgames|id=16274}} }} {{cleanup}} ==Reception== During the 2010 [[Cacowards]], ''Temple of the Lizard Men 2'' was one of the mods that did not receive awards but were nonetheless recommended, with the mention that "this mod is just really fun."
